name: The Fool
meaning_up: Fresh starts and open‑hearted trust. Say yes to the adventure.
meaning_rev: Prepare a little more, then take the step you already know is right.

name: The Magician
meaning_up: Your skills and voice matter—focus your will and make it real.
meaning_rev: Simplify your tools so your power flows cleanly.

name: The High Priestess
meaning_up: Your intuition is accurate. Listen for the soft ‘yes’.
meaning_rev: Quiet the noise; your inner guidance gets clearer with rest.

name: The Empress
meaning_up: Nurture and creativity bloom around you.
meaning_rev: Refill before you pour—self‑care is productive.

name: The Emperor
meaning_up: Structure supports you. Set a clear boundary.
meaning_rev: Make the rule kinder and it will work better for you.

name: The Hierophant
meaning_up: Lean on wisdom and share what uplifts others.
meaning_rev: Keep what resonates; release the rest with love.

name: The Lovers
meaning_up: Choose with your values; alignment invites ease.
meaning_rev: Re‑align with yourself first—clarity follows.

name: The Chariot
meaning_up: Momentum carries you forward. You’ve got this.
meaning_rev: Tiny course‑corrections restore flow.

name: Strength
meaning_up: Gentle courage turns obstacles into allies.
meaning_rev: Softness with yourself is the strongest move today.

name: The Hermit
meaning_up: A little solitude brings bright insight.
meaning_rev: You’re not alone; share your light and let support in.

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning_up: The tide turns in your favor—say yes to the opening.
meaning_rev: Breathe and trust timing; the click is coming.

name: Justice
meaning_up: Fairness and clarity land—stand in your integrity.
meaning_rev: Balance first; you can be kind and clear.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning_up: A new angle unlocks an easy answer.
meaning_rev: Loosen the timeline; insight arrives when you slow down.

name: Death
meaning_up: Gentle ending; clean beginning. Make room for new growth.
meaning_rev: Shed one thin layer at a time; you’re safe to change.

name: Temperance
meaning_up: Harmony through blending—meet in the middle.
meaning_rev: Lighten the mix; a little less here, a little more there.

name: The Devil
meaning_up: Reclaim your power—one small choice breaks the pattern.
meaning_rev: You’re already free; step out of the old story.

name: The Tower
meaning_up: Breakthrough clears space quickly; what remains is real.
meaning_rev: Stabilize upgrades—steady beats sudden overhauls.

name: The Star
meaning_up: Hope is practical—your healing radiates outward.
meaning_rev: Refill your well; the light returns as you rest.

name: The Moon
meaning_up: Trust dreams and subtle signals.
meaning_rev: Name the worry; once seen, it softens and passes.

name: The Sun
meaning_up: Joy and clarity—celebrate the win, big or small.
meaning_rev: Let a little sunlight in; it brightens everything else.

name: Judgement
meaning_up: Awakening—answer your own call with confidence.
meaning_rev: You can choose again; no perfection required.

name: The World
meaning_up: Completion and wholeness. Well done.
meaning_rev: Close the loop with gratitude; the next chapter opens easily.

name: Ace of Wands
meaning_up: Fresh spark in energy, creativity, purpose. Say yes to the new start.
meaning_rev: Pause to ground the new spark in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Two of Wands
meaning_up: Balanced choices in energy, creativity, purpose. Plan and proceed.
meaning_rev: Simplify options in energy, creativity, purpose; clarity first.

name: Three of Wands
meaning_up: Teamwork and growth in energy, creativity, purpose. Collaborate and build.
meaning_rev: Ask for support in energy, creativity, purpose; collaboration wants balance.

name: Four of Wands
meaning_up: Stability and gratitude in energy, creativity, purpose. Celebrate small wins.
meaning_rev: Make space for rest in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Five of Wands
meaning_up: Learning through contrast in energy, creativity, purpose. Reframe and adapt.
meaning_rev: Soften competition; learn and move on in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Six of Wands
meaning_up: Momentum and support in energy, creativity, purpose. Share and receive.
meaning_rev: Receive help in energy, creativity, purpose; you don’t have to do it alone.

name: Seven of Wands
meaning_up: Stand your ground in energy, creativity, purpose. Your stance is valid.
meaning_rev: Choose your battles in energy, creativity, purpose; protect your peace.

name: Eight of Wands
meaning_up: Progress accelerates in energy, creativity, purpose. Focus and flow.
meaning_rev: Reduce busywork; keep only what moves energy, creativity, purpose forward.

name: Nine of Wands
meaning_up: Resilience pays off in energy, creativity, purpose. Protect your gains.
meaning_rev: Lighten the guard; safe to exhale in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Ten of Wands
meaning_up: Completion in energy, creativity, purpose. Set down what’s heavy.
meaning_rev: Release overload; delegate in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Page of Wands
meaning_up: Curiosity awakens in energy, creativity, purpose. Try the beginner’s step.
meaning_rev: Be kind to the learner in you in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Knight of Wands
meaning_up: Purposeful action in energy, creativity, purpose. Channel your drive wisely.
meaning_rev: Aim your effort; steadiness beats speed in energy, creativity, purpose.

name: Queen of Wands
meaning_up: Warm mastery in energy, creativity, purpose. Nurture what matters.
meaning_rev: Refill your cup; boundaries keep energy, creativity, purpose thriving.

name: King of Wands
meaning_up: Confident leadership in energy, creativity, purpose. Decide and guide.
meaning_rev: Lead with empathy; invite input in energy, creativity, purpose.
